name: Super Dungeon Adventure Crawler Idle Quest
name_original: Super Dungeon Adventure Crawler Idle Quest
description:
A game made in (approximately) 48 hours over the span of a week for the Miz game jam: https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1

A mix between a dungeon crawler game and an incremental idle game.

Controls:

  • Mouse to buy items & increase your GPS
  • Z to attack
  • X to jump/interact
  • C to cancel (only available sometimes)

Note: This is an idle game that auto saves. Feel free to put it down and come back later!

See Devlog for links & more info!
